Subjects: prayers; women, authors; translations; Virgin Mary, prayers to
_description: A verse prayer, translating the Latin hymn ‘Gaude virgo mater Christi’ — 8 four-line stanzas

BLAru318.First Lines:
Gawde vergine and mother beingeTo criste Ihesu bothe god and
                    kinge…
BLAru318.Last Lines:
…Whose soule god pardon late Elener PercieVeritatis a
                    titulo

Barratt,  Alexandra,
                        ed.
